name: Neo_Fantasy_Project(W.i.P) demo
description:
A JRPG:- fantasy project inspired final fantasy that being one of the first game franchise i played it holds a special place in my heart and thus in this game expect plenty of references and Easter eggs to the series  and all feedback i good feedback as it will help me grow and refine this currently work in progress until the final release.

note : i do know that i can't make a game like this with out make it different enough from its inspiration as i don't want just make a fan game or a copyright nightmare but something that can stand on its own
